title: ICONIC 3 beds apartment for sale
details:
ICONIC 110 Parliament Road

FURNISHED 3 bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, Separate Maid's Room and Bathroom 1680 Sqft
Swimming Pool, Gym, tennis court, cargills food city, restaurant, Children Play Area
Conveniently Located. Closed to British School and Other International Schools, Shopping Malls, Hospitals.
Rs.43 Mil

FOR MORE INFORMATION PLS CALL HEMALI FERNANDO ON 0767 815 856
